attributes.action: Bring into law a mandatory minimum of 1 year in prison for anyone caught carrying any knife in a public place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should anyone be allowed to carry knives in a public place. By public place i mean street, park, pub or club. No one needs to carry these items at all. I have had to pay over £300 to the SIA just to be able to work, and the amount of personal safety equipment we need is getting more and more. Stabvests are now a definate requirement.I work as a Door Supervisor and have had occasions where knives have been found whilst people were being searched upon entry to a nightclub. They should be prepared to go to prison just for possession of these items. Please help and sign this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
